title: A discourse whether a noble man by birth or a gentleman by desert is greater in nobilitie
author: Nenna, Giovanni Battista.
publisher: Printed by Peter Short, and are to be solde [by J. Flasket] in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the blacke Beare,
notes: A translation, by Sir William Jones, of: Nenna, Giovanni Battista.  Il Nennio.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
